trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa el método que controla el evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting" /> de un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting> event when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") within the control is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control inserts the record.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controlar genera el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting> eventos cuando un botón Insertar (un botón con su `CommandName` propiedad establecida en "Insert") dentro del control se hace clic, pero antes del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control inserta el registro.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as HTML encoding or validating the values of a record before inserting it in the data source, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Esto le permite proporcionar un método de control de eventos que realiza una rutina personalizada, como codificación HTML o validación de los valores de un registro antes de insertarlo en el origen de datos, siempre que se produce este evento.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se crea un delegado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertEventHandler>, se identifica el método que controlará el evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controladores de eventos, vea [NIB: delegados y eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertEventHandler> delegate to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo agregar mediante programación un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertEventHandler> delegar a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting> eventos de un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to declaratively add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertEventHandler> delegate to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo agregar mediante declaración un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertEventHandler> delegar a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting> eventos de un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
